name: Get Backers Dakkanoku: Ura Shinjuku Saikyou Battle
summary: GetBackers Dakkanya: Urashinshiku Saikyou Battle is a role-playing video game was released for the PlayStation 2 on April 29, 2004 in Japan only, Developed by KCEJ and Published by Konami. It is the seventh and final game based on the manga and anime of same name.
